title: Rapid synthesis of aminal-linked covalent organic frameworks for CO2/CH4 separation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21151-21157
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02505A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jianwei Yang, Xianghao Han, Xiao Feng
Aminal-linked COFs, featuring excellent solvent compatibility and scalability, enable rapid synthesis within one hour. This study lays the foundation for rapid, large-scale COF production and practical applications.
